name: Higher education R&D expenditures at all institutions, ranked by all non-medical school R&D expenditures: FY 2022
description: Higher education R&D expenditures at all institutions, ranked by all non-medical school R&D expenditures: FY 2022

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_non_medical_school_r_d_expenditures
variableMeasured.description: All Non Medical School R D Expenditures

variableMeasured.name: field_all_medical_school_r_d_expenditures
variableMeasured.description: All Medical School R D Expenditures

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Tied institutions are ranked alphabetically. Ranked institutions are geographically separate campuses headed by a campus-level president or chancellor. Some campuses are part of large, multi-campus universities; some are part of state university systems. For a complete list of campuses that belong to a larger university or system and their aggregate R&D expenditures, see table 6.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2022.
